animation.condition: [Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Unwatched) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Released) | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

onleft.condition: ![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Unwatched) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Released)

item.visible: ![!IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu)) | !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(OptionsMenu)) | !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu))] + [![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Container.Content(photos) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Unwatched) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Released)]]

control.visible: [[ControlGroup(200).HasFocus + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu))] | [!IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(OptionsMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu))] | [Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Unwatched) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Released) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]] + !ControlGroup(1130).HasFocus + !ControlGroup(1132).HasFocus + !ControlGroup(300).HasFocus + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu))

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(50) + ![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(photos)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(51) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ColouredCircles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]

$LOCALIZE[42311]
